botMessages.message: Welcome! My name is Todd. I'm the Admissions Bot. How can I help you today? Please pick an option.
Would you like me to connect you to an agent who can assist further?
Thanks for taking the time to chat!
Sorry, I’m still learning. I’m afraid I didn’t understand that, can you please try again?
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment. Please try again during our business hours.
Got it. Let me see how I can help you with application deadlines.
It looks like we couldn't find any articles about that topic.
{!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Summary}.
You can also find more details by following this link: {!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Chat_Bot_URL__c}
Was this helpful?
I'm sorry.
Great! Is there anything else I can help you with?
contact ID was established
Okay. Let me see how I can help you speak with an Admissions Counsellor for assistance.
{!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Summary}
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Your Application Status is {!Application_Status}
Here is what to expect now that your application is complete
Here are the articles I found that may help you. Select from the following if you would like to learn more:
Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Your Application Status is {!Application_Status}, and checklist items are currently listed at {!ApplicationChecklistCompletion}% complete.
With all this in mind, here are some general processing times associated with application checklist items.
{!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Summary}
You can also find more details by following this link: {!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Chat_Bot_URL__c}
Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Sorry, we may not have a knowledge resource on that topic. Can you please try to search again?
DEBUG: Check for Email Address Dialog To get you that information, I'm going to need to be sure of who I'm talking to.
DEBUG Rule Search Counter less than 3
DEBUG: Search Counter too high. You have searched too many times. Please contact our team.
Can you confirm the email address is the one you used on your application?

retryMessages.message: Your email should be something like todd@salesforce.edu

botMessages.message: Great, so I'm going to look for an Application with the email address of {!Email_Address}

Great! We found you!
DEBUG (Result of email search: 1)
Opps, we found multiple applications [Contacts] with that email address. You'd better call an Admissions Counsellor

botDialogs.description: Will ask the visitor to provide an email address, which can be validated against the Contact and Application records.
botDialogs.label: Check email is valid for a Contact

botMessages.message: what is your email
We're going to send you an email with a verification code. This will be sent to {!Email_Address}
DEBUG MESSAGE: {!Verification_Code_Issued}
Can you please give me the Verification Code from the email?
Thanks for the verification code - that's good. Let's move on
That code didn't work, let's try again. I will send you a new code, please check your email again.

botDialogs.description: sends an email verification code to the client, to verify their email address.
botDialogs.label: Verification Code Send

botMessages.message: Alright, I found something. Here are your current application details.
Also, here are some general details about application checklist items you may find helpful:
{!AppDeadlineKnowledgeResults[0].Summary}.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
It appears you have multiple applications. Please select one of the following:
Thank you. Your application is currently listed as {!ApplicationSelection.hed__Application_Status__c}
It looks like we don't have any applications of file based on your information. Let me see if I can connect you with someone that can help you.
